ingredients.ingredient: 1 Â½ teaspoons garlic powder, or to taste

cookingTips: Cut cabbage into thick wedges to prevent pieces from falling through grill grates
Grill over medium heat to allow the interior to soften while exterior chars slightly
Season just before grilling to prevent salt from drawing out moisture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's your grill temperature experience? I can help you achieve the perfect char without burning.
